name: Emporio Swissmade
description:
Discover the complete watch collection,
experience the new Emporio Armani Swiss Made campaign and
explore the special extra contents that are only available online.

name: Frames of life
description:
Browse through your eyes and discover 5 real stories.
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

name: Fendilife
description:
To support the revealing of Fendi’s 2014 Spring/Summer collection,
Unit9 and Uprising created this beautiful and stylish html5 microsite.

name: Expand Your Vision
description:
ABB, Official Sponsor at Expo Milan 2015,
has built a digital environment in WebGL technology.

name: The beauty of a second
description:
A short film contest, curated by the director Wim Wenders,
to celebrate the 190th anniversary of the Nicolas Rieussec's chronograph.

name: 10 ways to try and destroy a candy
description:
Ten Ways to Try and Destroy a Candy is a promotional micro-site,
which illustrates and promotes Candy machines reliability.

name: Jägermusic
description:
In the context of a brand re-positioning project,
Uprising was tasked to realised a digital project to build the
brand awareness among the electronic music community.
